name: Dance Hero VR
description:
Game takes the player on the space dance floor environment in Virtual Reality. You can try to slightly improve your dance skills just by using HTC Vive. It's simple! Now, when you're in, you just have to choose a track. After that it all depends on you! You have to catch flying rings, which appear to the rhythm of the music.

For now, we've implemented only one track, Greg Helden - Fireman. By the way, thank you for sharing the song with us.

Link to his YouTube channel ;)

In the future there will be more tracks surelly!  

----------------------------------------

Gameplay description:

To start a game just grab green table placed in the center of room and throw it at the projector screen (this one in front of you).

To restart a level press menu button on the orange controller.
